content: We expect second quarter to be consistent with the first quarter with continued tight management of network and operating expenses, we would expect gross margin adjusted EBITDA margin to continue its methodical expansion to reiterate how we think about the combined company post integration and upon successful completion of these synergies initiatives, which will take 24 months from close the combined company is anticipated to have a growth rate of approximately 10% to 15%, better than 50% gross margins, improving to 60%, approximately 10% to 15% adjusted EBITDA and positive free cash flow.
